name: Crow Cafe Demo
description:
You have just moved in to the town of Wollstoncraft, a town full of mystery.  As an aspiring web-comic artist, you get a job at your local cafe. However, inspiration for your webcomic soon becomes too real as you get involved in the craziness of the town. 

This is currently a demo for the project. Please feel free to give feedback and follow for updates!
